titles.title: Justice Safety Valve Act of 2013
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prevent unjust and irrational criminal punishments.

bill.summary: 4/24/2013--Introduced. Justice Safety Valve Act of 2013 - Amends the federal criminal code to authorize a federal court to impose a sentence below a statutory minimum if necessary to avoid violating federal provisions prescribing factors courts must consider in imposing a sentence. Requires the court to give the parties notice of its intent to impose a lower sentence and to state in writing the factors requiring such a sentence.
